org.intermine.web.logic.help

Class HintManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.web.logic.help.HintManager

  • public class HintManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Hints are shown at the top of the pages in the web application, this class reads the hints in from properties and returns appropriate hints for a specified page.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_HINT_DISPLAY
      The maximum number of times a particular hint should be displayed in a session.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected HintManager(java.util.Properties webProperties)
      Construct with the InterMine web properties, extract the configured hints and set up in an internal map.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getHintForPage(java.lang.String page, WebState webState)
      Fetch a hint for the given page or return null if there are no hints or all hints have been displayed the maximum number of times.
      static HintManager getInstance(java.util.Properties webProperties)
      Return an instance of a HintManager.

      • getHintForPage

        public java.lang.String getHintForPage(java.lang.String page,
                              WebState webState)
        Fetch a hint for the given page or return null if there are no hints or all hints have been displayed the maximum number of times. There may be multiple hints per page, a hint that has been displayed the fewest number of times is selected. Hint display counts are stored and incremented in the user's WebState object.
        Parameters:
        page - name of the page to dispay hints for
        webState - state from the current session
        Returns:
        a hint or null if there are none to display
